seo_description: Professional Portfolio of Will Domine, a Full-Stack Developer specializing in Vue, Nuxt, and modern web technologies. Explore my latest projects, technical skills, and professional experience in software engineering.

home_section.description: Bridging the gap between {highPerformance} and modern user experiences. I build end-to-end solutions with a focus on performance at every layer.

about_section.title: About Me
about_section.summary: I am a {age}-year-old developer specializing in {highlight}. I bridge the gap between low-latency infrastructure and modern user experiences, building end-to-end solutions that prioritize performance at every layer.
about_section.cpp_project_desc: Utilized io_uring and FlatBuffers to achieve over 2M packets per second (PPS).
about_section.go_project_desc: Implemented Protocol Buffers and bitwise filtering for instant service routing.
about_section.lang_desc: Currently self-studying with the Genki I curriculum to build a strong foundation for professional communication.
